content.subject: Lizzy Summers
content.assertion: Lizzy described struggling with the last mile - saying finished in her brain before actually finished
content.quoted_text: I get so in denial about the last mile... I say finished in my brain before I'm really finished

content.subject: Rick Webster
content.assertion: Rick said 90% Steve fails in the last yard - doesn't go across the finish line
content.quoted_text: 90% Steve fails in the last yard, right, he just doesn't go across the finish line

content.subject: Rick Webster
content.assertion: Rick introduced a Venn diagram concept: values, personality, and skills overlapping as sweet spot
content.quoted_text: I've got my character issues, my values, I've got my personality, another circle. And I have got my skill set... that's my sweet spot

content.subject: Rick Webster
content.assertion: Rick mentioned VIA character strengths assessment at viacharacter.org
content.quoted_text: It's called VIA, V-I-A, like the way. Via, so viacharacter.org

content.subject: Rick Webster
content.assertion: Rick stated his first principle for planning: he doesn't have to do anything except breathe and find something to eat
content.quoted_text: I don't have to do anything. To me, that's an absolute first principle. There is nothing that I have to do other than breathe and find something to eat. So everything that's going on my calendar is my choice.

content.subject: Gio
content.assertion: Gio asked for clarification on first principles and how they connect to values
content.quoted_text: What is the connection between first principles and values?

content.subject: Stara Shakti
content.assertion: Stara committed to sending bio/headshot to Melissa for podcast promotion on January 11
content.quoted_text: I'm going to send the stuff to Melissa that I need to for her to promote... her podcast on January 11th

content.subject: Gio
content.assertion: Gio asked for literal instruction on planning - expressing need for structure
content.quoted_text: I kind of need something like that

claims.inference_rationale: Paraphrased from summary context - need to verify exact utterance

content.subject: Group
content.assertion: The group discussed procrastination as a signal of misalignment with values rather than a failure

claims.inference_rationale: Theme emerged from discussion of last mile challenges and values alignment

content.subject: Rick Webster
content.assertion: Rick shared body doubling schedule: M-F 7:30-8:30 AM PT; Tue/Wed/Fri 10:00-11:30 AM PT; Mon/Thu 5:00-7:00 PM PT

claims.inference_rationale: Schedule details from summary - specific times to be verified
